clauses.title: 1. Payment Terms
clauses.main_content: The Purchase Price shall be paid by the Buyer to the Seller via bank transfer as follows:

sub_clauses.title: a) Deposit
sub_clauses.content: Thirty percent (30%) of the Purchase Price, amounting to [Amount], shall be due upon the signing of this Agreement.

sub_clauses.title: b) Final Balance
sub_clauses.content: The remaining seventy percent (70%) of the Purchase Price, amounting to [Amount], shall be due within thirteen (30) business days following the successful delivery and inspection of the Goods at the Buyer's location.

sub_clauses.title: c) Late Payments
sub_clauses.content: Any amount not paid when due will be subject to a late payment interest charge of 1.5% per month, or the maximum rate permitted by law, whichever is lower.

sub_clauses.title: a) Retention of Title
sub_clauses.content: Title to and ownership of the Goods shall remain with the Seller until the Buyer has paid the Purchase Price in full.

sub_clauses.title: b) Security Interest
sub_clauses.content: The Buyer hereby grants the Seller a purchase money security interest in the Goods, and all proceeds thereof, to secure the payment of the Purchase Price.

sub_clauses.title: c) Right of Repossession
sub_clauses.content: In the event of a payment default by the Buyer that is not cured within fifteen (15) days of written notice from the Seller, the Seller shall have the right, in addition to any other remedies available at law, to enter the premises where the Goods are located and repossess them without liability for trespass, in accordance with applicable law.

clauses.title: 3. Taxes
clauses.content: The Purchase Price is exclusive of any and all applicable taxes, including but not limited to value-added tax (VAT), sales tax, use tax, and any other duties or levies. The Buyer shall be solely responsible for the payment of all such taxes.

sub_clauses.title: a) Delivery Time
sub_clauses.content: The Seller shall deliver the Goods to the Buyer on or before [Delivery Date].

sub_clauses.title: b) Location
sub_clauses.content: Delivery shall be made to the Buyer’s facility located at [Buyer's Delivery Address] (the "Delivery Location").

sub_clauses.title: c) Risk of Loss
sub_clauses.content: The risk of loss or damage to the Goods shall pass from the Seller to the Buyer upon completion of unloading the Goods at the Delivery Location.

clauses.title: 4. Post-Sale Support (Service Level Agreement)
clauses.main_content: For warranty-related issues covered under Section 8, the Seller commits to the following support levels:

sub_clauses.title: a) Acknowledgement
sub_clauses.content: The Seller will acknowledge receipt of a service request from the Buyer via email or phone within twenty-four (24) business hours.

sub_clauses.title: b) Technical Response
sub_clauses.content: The Seller will use commercially reasonable efforts to diagnose the issue and propose a resolution plan (which may include dispatching a technician) within three (3) business days of acknowledgement.

sub_clauses.title: a) Limited Warranty
sub_clauses.content: The Seller warrants that for a period of twelve (12) months or 2,000 operating hours, whichever occurs first, from the date of delivery, the Goods will be free from material defects in workmanship and materials under normal use and service.

sub_clauses.title: b) Exclusions
sub_clauses.content: This warranty does not cover: (i) normal wear and tear; (ii) parts that are considered consumable; (iii) damage caused by misuse, accident, or operation contrary to the manufacturer’s instructions; or (iv) any Goods that have been altered or repaired by unauthorized personnel.

sub_clauses.title: c) Remedy
sub_clauses.content: The Seller's sole obligation and the Buyer’s exclusive remedy under this warranty shall be, at the Seller’s option, to either repair or replace the defective part(s).

sub_clauses.title: d) DISCLAIMER
sub_clauses.content: EXCEPT FOR THE EXPRESS WARRANTY SET FORTH IN THIS SECTION, THE SELLER MAKES NO OTHER WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

clauses.title: 6. Insurance
clauses.content: From the moment of delivery until the Purchase Price is paid in full, the Buyer shall, at its own expense, maintain comprehensive insurance on the Goods for their full replacement value against all risks, including but not limited to loss, theft, and damage. The Buyer shall name the Seller as an additional insured and loss payee on the insurance policy and shall provide a certificate of insurance to the Seller upon request.

clauses.title: 7. Force Majeure
clauses.content: Neither Party shall be liable for any failure or delay in performing its obligations hereunder (except for payment obligations) if such failure or delay is due to any cause beyond its reasonable control, including but not limited to acts of God, war, terrorism, civil unrest, government action, pandemics, or natural disasters (a "Force Majeure Event"). The affected Party shall provide prompt written notice to the other Party and shall use commercially reasonable efforts to resume performance. If a Force Majeure Event continues for more than ninety (90) days, either Party may terminate this Agreement upon written notice.

clauses.title: 8. Governing Law & Jurisdiction
clauses.content: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the SELLERS country of operation, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of [City, State/Country, e.g., Munich, Germany].
